Over Alejandra Amarilla, Steveâs ex-wife, Nash and Richardson got into a fight. Alejandra and Steve got married in 2005, but she allegedly cheated on him by seeing Richardson. Additionally, Nashâs ex-wife was said to have fathered a child with a former teammate.

The conflict between Jason Richardson and Steve Nash dates back more than ten years.

Steve Nash is one of the finest point guards in NBA history. He has won two MVP awards and numerous other honours as a result of his outstanding playmaking abilities, which assisted the Phoenix Suns in becoming an offensive powerhouse. In 2001, Nash and Alejandra Amarilla met in New York City. He was a standout player for the Dallas Mavericks at the time. In October 2004 the couple became parents to two children; they later wed in 2005. However, a few years later, their marriage broke down.

Many supporters think that this was the catalyst for the conflict between Jason Richardson and Steve Nash. Steve Nash and his then-wife made the announcement that they were divorcing shortly after the birth of their third child. There was a rumour that Alejandra cheated on Steve with his teammate Jason Richardson, which was somewhat startling.
